segments.text: Hey , Teresa , meet the new neighbors yet ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Actually , i popped in them last night .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , let's cut to the chase . what are they like ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll say , she is really stacked , isn't she ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , she is a neck-off for sure .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And he looks like a typical jog .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He is a professional football player .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Anyway , that is not what I meant by beautiful .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I meant that they're very simple , easy to talk to .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah . I think things are worked out just fine .
segments.speaker: S2
